bugReport.Title: The message in the feedback form is not sended to server
bugReport.Preconditions: 1. Navigate to zzzzzz.com, 2. Open the section Contacts
bugReport.StepsToReproduce: 1. Open the feedback form, 2. Enter valid data in the field 'Name' - 'Ivan', 3. Enter valid data in the field 'Email' - 'ivan@google.com', 4. Enter valid data in the field 'Message' - 'The form doesn't work', 5. Click on the button [Send message]
bugReport.ExpectedResult: The message is sended to server
bugReport.ActualResult: The message is not sended to server
